title.value: Изучение безвредности бычьего рекомбинантного альфа-интерферона in vitro и in vivo
Studying of harmlessness of bull recombinant alpha-interferon in vitro and in vivo
Studying of harmlessness of bull recombinant alpha-interferon in vitro and in vivo

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Krasochko, P.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine
Prokulevich, V.A., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Borisovets, D.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine
Chuenko, I.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)
Potapovich, M.I., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The basic mechanisms of interferon (low molecular weight protein (20-40 thousand daltons) of globulin nature) in formation of the immune answer in an organism of animals are shown in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. Information about studying of interferon toxicity on cells culture and on laboratory animals are presented. As a result of carrying out researches it is possible to draw a conclusion, that the interferon containing preparation does not render negative influence on cells culture of a line 'MDBK' and within the limits of the used dozes can be carried to harmless preparations, and at its test for animal changes in a clinical condition and destruction is not noted.
